code: @Override protected void configure(HttpSecurity http) throws Exception {     // @formatter:off     http.authorizeRequests().mvcMatchers("/actuator/beans").hasRole("BEANS").requestMatchers(EndpointRequest.to("health", "info")).permitAll().requestMatchers(EndpointRequest.toAnyEndpoint().excluding(MappingsEndpoint.class)).hasRole("ACTUATOR").requestMatchers(PathRequest.toStaticResources().atCommonLocations()).permitAll().antMatchers("/foo").permitAll().antMatchers("/**").hasRole("USER").and().cors().and().httpBasic(). // @formatter:on }
